sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YE162010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_D101Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PNSN_SEIL_NUM = AA.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO )
AA.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162010 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속년도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO /* 계좌번호_증권번호 */ ,TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD /* 국세청자료구분코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL /* 연금저축소득공제구분코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD /* 연금저축금융기관코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP /* 굼융회사등명 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT /* 연금저축계좌납입금액 */ ,IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT /* 연금저축계좌세액공제금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC03.PNSN_SEIL_NUM ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , AC03.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , AC03.COM_CD , AC03.TRADE_NM , AC03.PNSN_AMT_SUM , 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , AA.PNSN_SEIL_NUM , ('Y0040030') AS PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , AA.COM_CD , AA.TRADE_NM , AA.PNSN_AMT_SUM FROM PDF_D101Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' ) ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )

INSERT INTO YE162010 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속년도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO /* 계좌번호_증권번호 */ ,TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD /* 국세청자료구분코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL /* 연금저축소득공제구분코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD /* 연금저축금융기관코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP /* 굼융회사등명 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT /* 연금저축계좌납입금액 */ ,IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT /* 연금저축계좌세액공제금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , (CASE WHEN TRIM(PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL) = '연금저축-개인연금저축' THEN 'Y0040030' WHEN TRIM(PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL) = '연금저축-연금저축' THEN 'Y0040040' ELSE '99999999' END) , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167130 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YE162010 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_E102Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM = AA.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO )
AA.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO YE162010 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속년도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO /* 계좌번호_증권번호 */ ,TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD /* 국세청자료구분코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL /* 연금저축소득공제구분코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD /* 연금저축금융기관코드 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP /* 굼융회사등명 */ ,PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT /* 연금저축계좌납입금액 */ ,IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT /* 연금저축계좌세액공제금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC03.PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM , 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , AC03.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , AC03.COM_CD , AC03.TRADE_NM , AC03.DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , AA.PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM , ('Y0040040') AS PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , AA.COM_CD , AA.TRADE_NM , AA.DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT
FROM PDF_E102Y AA
WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y'
AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' ) ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID
)
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162010 SET /* 연금저축대상금액 */ PNSN_SVNG_ACC_TGT_AMT = #pnsnSvngAccTgtAmt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO = #pnsnSvngAccAccno#

UPDATE YE162010 AC03 SET
/* 개인연금 */ IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT =(SELECT (CASE WHEN AC01.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL = 'Y0040030' THEN AC01.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_TGT_AMT WHEN AC01.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL = 'Y0040040' THEN (CASE WHEN AC02.YETA_0C63 <= 55000000 THEN NVL(AC01.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_TGT_AMT,0) * 0.15 ELSE NVL(AC01.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_TGT_AMT,0) * 0.12 END) ELSE 0 END ) FROM YE169010 AC02 , YE162010 AC01 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD = AC01.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC01.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO = AC03.PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO ) , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE AC03.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC03.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #pnsnSvngAccAccno# , #pnsnSvngAccPnsnSvngCl# , #pnsnSvngFnnOrgnCd# , #pnsnSvngAccFnnCmp# , #pnsnSvngAccPymAmt# , #ipnsnSvngAccddcAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162010 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL=#pnsnSvngAccPnsnSvngCl# , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD=#pnsnSvngFnnOrgnCd# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP=#pnsnSvngAccFnnCmp# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT=#pnsnSvngAccPymAmt# , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT=#ipnsnSvngAccddcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
